summary: The diff implements the requested copy change from “Ready to Cut” to “Ready to Cook” in the visible navigation label, category tile label, and the section heading shown in the provided file excerpts. However, the diff summary also indicates unrelated changes to image-loading behavior that were not requested and may violate the constraint to not change images/image URLs.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits changes to the specified wording only and says not to change images or image URLs. The diff summary indicates image behavior changes unrelated to the text substitution.
